```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
df = read.csv("CleanDf.csv")
df = df[1:10]
df = df[complete.cases(df),]
index = which(df$Manner.of.death == "")
df = df[-index,]
df = df %>% group_by(Manner.of.death) %>% mutate(count=n()) %>% filter(count>1) %>% select(-count)
#table(df$Manner.of.death)
write.csv(df,"ModelDf.csv",row.names = FALSE)
```
